title: $:/plugins/telmiger/WMR
author: Thomas Elmiger
name: Wikitext Markup Reference – WMR
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "CircleJack.svg": { "title": "CircleJack.svg", "text": "", "type": "image/svg+xml", "created": "20170918060138058", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219150938674", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "picture" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/about": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/about", "created": "20181125122609022", "modified": "20200219150938451", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!!! About the Wikitext Markup Reference Examples are copied from or inspired by * [[Tobi Beer's Markup Reference|http://tobibeer.github.io/tb5/#Markup%20Reference]] ** try the [[searchable version|http://tobibeer.github.io/tb5/#Markup]] too! A great idea found via [[Greg Davis' Begin plugin|http://gdplugins.tiddlyspot.com/#%24%3A%2Fplugins%2Fgdavis%2Ftwbegin]]." }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/bar": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/bar", "caption": "Bar", "created": "20181129205651711", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938497", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "Bar", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "He ordered another beer." }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/code": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/code", "created": "20181124200421812", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938484", "modifier": "Thomas", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<> Use double backticks ... <> For longer code use a [[code block|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Code%20Blocks%20in%20WikiText]]: 
```
monospaced
codeblock
```
``` monospaced codeblock ```" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/filters": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/filters", "created": "20181128065322406", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938468", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "wmr-source-link": "https://tiddlywiki.com/#Filter%20Expression", "text": " !!! Display the result of a filter expression Use [[filter operators|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Filter%20Operators]] like `tag` to select tiddlers. List tiddlers tagged `Foo`: <> List tiddlers tagged `Foo` OR `Bar`: <> List tiddlers tagged `Foo` AND `Bar`: <> List tiddlers tagged `Foo` NOT `Bar`: <> --- !!! Limit results <> --- !!! Sorting Sort titles: <> Sort reverse: <> Sort numbers: <> First created: <> Last modified: <> --- !!! Special effects !!!! If empty ... aka Else ~ Since TW version 5.1.18 <> !!!! Range <> See https://tiddlywiki.com/#range%20Operator" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/font-variants": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/font-variants", "created": "20181124191306552", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938522", "modifier": "Thomas", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <>" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/foo-bar": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/foo-bar", "caption": "Foo Bar", "created": "20181130170447615", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219150938505", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "Bar Foo Dummy", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "Dummy text" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/foo": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/foo", "caption": "Foo", "created": "20181127222534567", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938514", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "Foo Dummy", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "wmr-example": "54rem", "text": "A man went into a ''bar''. He ordered a beer." }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/html": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/html", "created": "20181124205849430", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938529", "modifier": "Thomas", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "
```
HTML tags work like that.
```
HTML tags work like that.
``` link >>bold ```
link >>bold set attributes via transclusion or macro
```
inspect me!
```
inspect me!
``` * nest
; via : html
```
*nest
;via :html
" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/icon": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/icon", "created": "20181125123109958", "modified": "20200219150938666", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "{{CircleJack.svg}}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/images": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/images", "created": "20181124203347203", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938658", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "wmr-source-link": "https://tiddlywiki.com/#Images%20in%20WikiText", "text": "!!! Internal images Images saved in the wiki: <> !!! Images from the web <> !!! Images in separate files <> Solutions can be found in the user group ... " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/links": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/links", "created": "20181124191601375", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938648", "modifier": "Thomas", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "wmr-source-link": "https://tiddlywiki.com/#Linking%20in%20WikiText", "text": "!!! Internal Wiki Links <> <> !!! External Links <> !!! File Links Links to local/external files: see [[tiddlywiki.com|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Linking%20in%20WikiText]] " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/lists": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/lists", "created": "20181124191350660", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938642", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! Wikitext lists !!! Unordered list <> !!! Ordered list <> !!! [[Definition list|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Definitions%20in%20WikiText]] <> --- !! [[List widget|https://tiddlywiki.com/prerelease/#ListWidget]] < """>> <> !!! List format ```
    <$list filter="[tag[Foo]sort[title]]">
  • <>
```
    <$list filter="[tag[Foo]sort[title]]">
  • <>
!!! Store list item in variable By default, the title of the list item is stored in the Current Tiddler variable: ``` <$list filter="[tag[Bar]]"> <> {{||$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags}} ``` <$list filter="[tag[Bar]]"> <> {{||$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags}} When we store the title in our own variable, the Current Tiddler remains unchanged. In the following example, the tags of the displaying tiddler will be shown: ``` <$list filter="[tag[Bar]]" variable="tiddler"> <> {{||$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags}} ``` <$list filter="[tag[Bar]]" variable="tiddler"> <> {{||$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags}} !!! Empty message ``` <$list filter="[tag[foo]limit[1]]" emptyMessage="No `foo` tagged tiddlers available."> `foo` tagged tiddlers exist ``` <$list filter="[tag[foo]limit[1]]" emptyMessage="No `foo` tagged tiddlers available."> `foo` tagged tiddlers exist ``` <$list filter="[tag[Foo]limit[1]]" emptyMessage="no `Foo` tagged tiddlers available"> `Foo` tagged tiddlers exist. ``` <$list filter="[tag[Foo]limit[1]]" emptyMessage="no `Foo` tagged tiddlers available"> `Foo` tagged tiddlers exist. " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/macros": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/macros", "created": "20181124210017691", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938635", "modifier": "Thomas", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "
``` \define run(foo:'bar') [[$foo$]] <> ```
» defines macro `run`
» with parameter `foo`
» whose value defaults to `bar`
» outputs a link to value of param:
  [[foo bar]]
``` \define test() I am $(x)$. \end <$set name="x" value="y of z"> <> ```
» defines macro test which
» outputs value of variable x

» sets variable x to: "y
  of z" //(multiline allowed)//
» runs macro test which outputs:
  "I am y of z."
``` \define test(x, y, z:'0') $x$ $y$ $z$ \end <$macrocall $name="test" x=<> y={{!!title}}/> ```
» defines macro test
» outputs 3 params

» calls test via macrocall widget
» using macro version as param x
» and transclusion as param y

» output: <> {{!!title}} 0
" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/new-lines": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/new-lines", "created": "20181124200219330", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938627", "modifier": "Thomas", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<>
``` """ tripple quotes to force //hard// linebreaks like this. """ ```
""" tripple quotes to force hard linebreaks like this. """ < as well as
are //accepted.// ">> Both result in a `
` when rendered. " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/plugin-macros": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/plugin-macros", "created": "20181124191802720", "modified": "20200219150938617", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define wt(wikitext:"example") <$wikify name="in" text="""$wikitext$""" type="text/plain"> <$set name="out" value=""" $wikitext$ """> <$macrocall $name="renderWT" input=<> output=<>/> \end \define renderWT(input,output)
``` $input$ ```
$output$
\end \define revealstate(tiddler,stateID) <$set name="qualstate" value=<> > <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="visible" animate="yes"> <$button set=<> setTo="visible" class="btnClosed">Show <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="visible" animate="yes"> <$button set=<> setTo="hidden" class="btnOpen">Hide section
<$transclude tiddler="$tiddler$" mode="block"/>
<$list filter="[{$tiddler$!!wmr-source-link}prefix[https://tiddlywiki.com]]"> More on tiddlywiki.com | <$link to="$tiddler$">Open separately
\end " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/quotes": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/quotes", "created": "20181129204618410", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938607", "modifier": "Thomas", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!!! [[Quotes and citations|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Block%20Quotes%20in%20WikiText]] <> <> " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/reference": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/reference", "created": "20181125111047842", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938597", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "
!! Font Variants <> !! Lists, Definitions <> !! Links <> !! Special Characters, Lines, Ruler <> !! New Lines <> !! Quotes <> !! Styles <> !! Images <> !! Tables <> !! Code <> !! Plain HTML <> !! Transclusion <> !! Tabs <> !! Special Cases <> !! Variables <> !! Macros <> !! Filters <> !! Templates <> !! Typed Elements <>
" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/special-chars": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/special-chars", "created": "20181124191754197", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938582", "modifier": "Thomas", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<> < ">> <> <> [[More Unicode characters and HTML entities|https://www.key-shortcut.com/en/character-tables/unicode-2000-2fff/]]" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/special": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/special", "created": "20181124200507179", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938591", "modifier": "Thomas", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "
``` > block >> quotes >>> are easy ```
> block >> quotes >>> are
easy < like so ">> " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/styles.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/styles.css", "created": "20181124215313762", "modified": "20200219150938567", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": ".wikitext-examples .wmr-input { margin-top: 2rem; max-width: 28rem; } .wikitext-examples footer { background-color: #e9e9e9; padding: 0.25rem; border-bottom: 1px solid #999; } .wmr-output .red { color: red; fill: red; } /* Buttons */ .wikitext-examples .btnClosed, .wikitext-examples .btnOpen { width: 100%; text-align: left; background: #e9e9e9; border: none; padding: 0.25rem; } .wikitext-examples .btnClosed:before { content: "▶"; margin-right: 0.5rem; } .wikitext-examples .btnOpen:before { content: "▼"; margin-right: 0.5rem; }" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/styles": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/styles", "created": "20181124200539896", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938574", "modifier": "Thomas", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "wmr-source-link": "https://tiddlywiki.com/#How%20to%20apply%20custom%20styles", "text": "<.red this ">> <> <> <> < .purple{color:purple;} ">>" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/tables": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/tables", "created": "20181124205512397", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938560", "modifier": "Thomas", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!!! Positioning <> !!! Cells <~ (up) | |>| right >|~| """>> !!! Header, Footer, Caption, Style <> " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/tabs": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/tabs", "created": "20181130193703180", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219150938552", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "wmr-source-link": "https://tiddlywiki.com/#tabs%20Macro", "text": "!!! Filter tiddlers for tabs <$macrocall $name="wt" wikitext="""<>"""/> !!! Vertical tabs <$macrocall $name="wt" wikitext="""<>"""/>" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/templates": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/templates", "created": "20181129173332986", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938545", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "wmr-source-link": "https://tiddlywiki.com/#Transclusion%20with%20Templates", "text": "[[Transclude|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Transclusion%20in%20WikiText]] tiddler `.../foo` applying [[template|https://tiddlywiki.com/#TemplateTiddlers]] `.../tmpl-code`: <> Use template `Bar` for the [[Current Tiddler|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Current%20Tiddler]] (default):
``` {{||Bar}} ```
--- A template can show different fields of a tiddler. While the list of tiddlers tagged `Foo` shows the content of the field `title` ... <> ... the same for tag `Bar` displayed through the template $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle shows the content of the fields `modifier` and `modified`: <>" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/tmpl-code": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/tmpl-code", "caption": "Bar", "created": "20181130195051148", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219150938537", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "
{{!!text}}
" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/transclusion": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/transclusion", "created": "20181124205928499", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938697", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "wmr-source-link": "http://tiddlywiki.com/#Transclusion%20in%20WikiText", "text": "!!! Display content from other tiddlers Transclude [[text|$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/foo]] and [[images|$:/core/images/home-button]] from the main content (text field): <> <> !!! Content of tiddler fields
``` {{Foo!!bar}} {{!!bar}} ```
* field `bar` of tiddler `Foo` * field `bar` of the Current Tiddler !!! Data tiddler entries
``` {{Foo##index}} {{##index}} ```
* `index` of [[datatiddler|https://tiddlywiki.com/#DataTiddlers]] titled `Foo` * `index` of `CurrentTiddler` --- !!! Transclude widget Try the [[transclude widget|https://tiddlywiki.com/#TranscludeWidget]] if you have to set the parsing mode manually. <'>> <'>>" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/typed-elements": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/typed-elements", "created": "20181124210140010", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938690", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "
``` $$$text/unknown plain text, not //formatted// $$$ ```
$$$text/unknown plain text, not //formatted// $$$
These are [[Typed Blocks|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Typed%20Blocks%20in%20WikiText]]
``` $$$image/svg+xml $$$ ```
$$$image/svg+xml $$$
``` $$$.svg $$$ ```
$$$.svg $$$
``` $$$text/vnd.tiddlywiki>text/html This is ''some'' wikitext $$$ ```
$$$text/vnd.tiddlywiki>text/html This is ''some'' wikitext $$$
``` $$$text/vnd.tiddlywiki>text/plain This is ''some'' wikitext $$$ ```
$$$text/vnd.tiddlywiki>text/plain This is ''some'' wikitext $$$ " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/variables": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/variables", "created": "20181128064053957", "creator": "Thomas", "modified": "20200219150938682", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ShortReference", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define animal1() lion \define animals1() seal
penguin \end !!! Set the value of a variable To use a local variable in a single tiddler, insert a definition at the very top of the tiddler: `\define animal1() lion` To use a variable in a limited part of a tiddler, use the [[set widget|https://tiddlywiki.com/#SetWidget]]: <$macrocall $name="wt" wikitext="""<$set name="animal2" value="zebra"> <> eats <> """/> !!! Multi-line variables ``` \define animals1() seal
penguin \end <> ``` <> <$macrocall $name="wt" wikitext="""<$set name="animals2" value=" * zebra * gnu * antelope "> <> """/> !!! Variables as parameters <$tiddler tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/foo"> <$macrocall $name="wt" wikitext="""<$set name="mywidth" value={{!!wmr-example}}> [img width=<> [CircleJack.svg]] """/> !!!! Change the value <$macrocall $name="wt" wikitext="""<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/foo" field="wmr-example"/> """/> Hint: We also use the [[tiddler widget|https://tiddlywiki.com/#TiddlerWidget]] above to set $:/plugins/telmiger/WMR/foo as the current tiddler in the context of the image. This makes sure that the [[text reference|https://tiddlywiki.com/#TextReference]] `!!wmr-example` points to the right field. The edit text widget should ''not'' be used to edit a field of the tiddler that contains it to ommit unwanted side effects. " } } }
